programlisting:
@staticmethod def describe_models(lookoutvision_client, project_name): """ Gets information about all models in a Lookout for Vision project.
:param lookoutvision_client: A Boto3 Lookout for Vision client. :param project_name: The name of the project that you want to use. """ try: response = lookoutvision_client.list_models(ProjectName=project_name) print("Project: " + project_name) for model in response["Models"]: Models.describe_model( lookoutvision_client, project_name, model["ModelVersion"]) print() print("Done...") except ClientError: logger.exception("Couldn't list models.") raise
